TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit StopwordRemover extends Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.TrivialWrapperEstimator
Public NotInheritable Class StopwordRemover Inherits TrivialWrapperEstimator

Docs.summary: Stopword remover removes language-specific lists of stop words (most common words) This is usually applied after tokenizing text, so it compares individual tokens (case-insensitive comparison) to the stopwords.

MemberSignature.Value: public StopwordRemover (Microsoft.ML.Runtime.IHostEnvironment env, ValueTuple<string,string>[] columns, Microsoft.ML.Transforms.Text.StopWordsRemoverTransform.Language language = Microsoft.ML.Transforms.Text.StopWordsRemoverTransform+Language.English);

Docs.param: Pairs of columns to remove stop words on.
Langauge of the input text columns .
Docs.summary: Removes stop words from incoming token streams in input columns and outputs the token streams without stop words as output columns.
